column5: Lost my HT rod locker out from the launch at Sibbald Pt. Provincil Park on the evening Saturday March 14. Contained three rods, one was my daughter's, one my son's and the other mine. These rods mean alot to my kids and would like to have them returned. A reward is offered and I will describe the rods exactly. Please email. mailto:[emailÂ protected] or call (905) 244-0692. Thanks Mark.   Just incase any OFNER comes accross this wanted to post it for the guy since we have members all over ontario
*bump*  good luck Mark and I hope you get this back!  Geoff
Thanks alot Aile Goby, That is top notch of you. I had previously posted my unfortunate bad luck, but looks like it's buried by other posts. Again thanks for the kindness. No word yet.
Hope someone out there finds it and has a heart to return it to you.
